title: WCAS ASIAN_LC 492-0-20 Topical Seminar in Asian Humanities

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The aim of this course is to develop Tibetan language speaking and reading skills, improving pronunciation and expanding vocabulary. In addition, the class will focus on developing Tibetan-English translation skills, focusing on a number of different genres of Tibetan texts ranging from religious scripture, essay, poetry, history, and biography.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value:
By the end of this course, you will have improved your ability to
? Speak and understand colloquial Tibetan
? Comprehend literary Tibetan
? Accurately translate literary Tibetan into English

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: The course will stress student participation in classroom discussion about Tibetan texts.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: The course will have a midterm exam, and a final exam.
